name: Multilpe Social Media
author: Ajay Kumar, Harpinder Singh

sections.description:
This plugin is very useful for those who want to display Multiple Social Media on their front end pages. It has a very user friendly admin option page that lets user to save setting for Twitter, Facebook, ShareThis. Automatic and Manual mode is provided for displaying Social Media with display order inputting. Very fast, easy to use plugin for both single site installation.

Facebook options – FB Like, Follow US, Facepile
Twitter options – Follow US, Twitter Share

Global setting is provided in admin panel for all buttons in this plug-in like for enabling display buttons on all pages, display buttons on home page only, Position (Before page content, After page content, Both). You can edit css style setting also.

HOW TO USE:

  1. Activate options
  2. Fill all fields (Optional fields are marked)
  3. Save changes

HOW TO ADD MANUALLY:
There is simple steps to use manually

  1. You need to add code with parameters:
    display_social(params);

  2. There are different parameters given below (not case sensitive):

      * Facebook Like:FBLIKE
  * Facebook FollowUS:FBFOLLOW
  * Twitter Share:TWSHARE
  * Twitter FollowUS:TWFOLLOW
  * Share this:SHARETHIS
  * Facebook FacePile:FBFACEPILE

Thank You

Thank you for trying my plugin!
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin and extract the files
  2. Upload “multiple-social-media” folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Use Social Media menu links at left side menus in Administration area.
sections.faq:
Where do I submit a question?

This is my first attempt at a plugin, so I don’t have a FAQ yet. You can contact me at singhharpinder@hotmail.com

short_description: It lets user adds Twitter, Facebook, ShareThis social media on pages. Build with various options like display order, automatic, manual mode.
